H0.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Thyroid Cancer

H1.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Hypothyroidism

H2.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Cretinism

H3.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Goider

A4.text: Iodine deficiency is the leading cause of preventable intellectual disability, a result which occurs primarily when babies or small children are rendered hypothyroidic by a lack of the element.

A5.text: Iodine deficiency can impair brain development and may lead to intellectual disability.

A6.text: Goiter is an iodine deficiency disorder

A7.text: Deficiency also causes thyroid gland problems, including endemic goitre.

A8.text: There is not enough iodine in iodised salt to block the uptake of radioactive iodine by the thyroid.
